com.github.pwittchen.reactivewifi

Class ReactiveWifi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.pwittchen.reactivewifi.ReactiveWifi

  • public class ReactiveWifi
extends java.lang.Object
    ReactiveWiFi is an Android library listening available WiFi Access Points change of the WiFi signal strength with RxJava Observables. It can be easily used with RxAndroid.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <any> observeSupplicantState(android.content.Context context)
      Observes the current WPA supplicant state.
      static <any> observeWifiAccessPointChanges(android.content.Context context)
      Observes the WiFi network the device is connected to.
      static <any> observeWifiAccessPoints(android.content.Context context)
      Observes WiFi Access Points.
      static <any> observeWifiSignalLevel(android.content.Context context)
      Observes WiFi signal level with predefined max num levels.
      static <any> observeWifiSignalLevel(android.content.Context context, int numLevels)
      Observes WiFi signal level.
      static <any> observeWifiStateChange(android.content.Context context)
      Observes WiFi State Change Action Returns wifi state whenever WiFi state changes such like enable,disable,enabling,disabling or Unknown

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • observeWifiAccessPoints

        public static <any> observeWifiAccessPoints(android.content.Context context)
        Observes WiFi Access Points. Returns fresh list of Access Points whenever WiFi signal strength changes.
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the activity or an application
        Returns:
        RxJava Observable with list of WiFi scan results

      • observeWifiSignalLevel

        public static <any> observeWifiSignalLevel(android.content.Context context)
        Observes WiFi signal level with predefined max num levels. Returns WiFi signal level as enum with information about current level
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the activity or an application
        Returns:
        WifiSignalLevel as an enum

      • observeWifiSignalLevel

        public static <any> observeWifiSignalLevel(android.content.Context context,
                                           int numLevels)
        Observes WiFi signal level. Returns WiFi signal level as an integer
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the activity or an application
        numLevels - The number of levels to consider in the calculated level as Integer
        Returns:
        RxJava Observable with WiFi signal level

      • observeSupplicantState

        public static <any> observeSupplicantState(android.content.Context context)
        Observes the current WPA supplicant state. Returns the current WPA supplicant as a member of the SupplicantState enumeration, returning SupplicantState.UNINITIALIZED if WiFi is not enabled.
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the activity or an application
        Returns:
        RxJava Observable with SupplicantState

      • observeWifiAccessPointChanges

        public static <any> observeWifiAccessPointChanges(android.content.Context context)
        Observes the WiFi network the device is connected to. Returns the current WiFi network information as a WifiInfo object.
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the activity or an application
        Returns:
        RxJava Observable with WifiInfo

      • observeWifiStateChange

        public static <any> observeWifiStateChange(android.content.Context context)
        Observes WiFi State Change Action Returns wifi state whenever WiFi state changes such like enable,disable,enabling,disabling or Unknown
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the activity or an application
        Returns:
        RxJava Observable with different state change
